title: Devil May Care
description: Buried secrets always surface.Captain has been in love with Eddie since he first laid eyes on her. Unfortunately, she was already married to a man who didn't deserve her. So, Captain moved on, but the torch he carries still burns hot. Eddie is the reigning queen bee of the club and makes the finest moonshine in all of Texas. So fine, in fact, it's been cutting into the mob's bootlegging business.When the mob targets her, Captain offers himself as a bodyguard. But he can't protect her from discovering the ugly truth about her late husband. And about him.
author: Cynthia Rayne
